translation.en: Ready or not, here I come.
You'll stay with Aunt May and Uncle Ben for a little while.
Doesn't like crust on his sandwiches...
...and he likes to sleep with a little light on.
Listen, are you busy Friday night?
Cool. Can you take pictures of my boyfriend's car?
You know, I really wanna frame a good one for his birthday.
That's really nice of you. Wow, that's such a nice thought.
Yeah, I'll have a look at the old....
-Yes, sir? -You want to keep that skateboard?
Eat it! Eat it! Eat it!
Eat it! Eat it! Eat it!
Eat your vegetables, Gordon. Come on!
No, I'm not gonna take a picture of it. Put him down, man.
Get up! Come on! Come on! Get up!
...we still on for after school today?
-Okay, move. -No, how about we go to class?
I thought that was great what you did.
It was stupid, but it was great.
You should go to the nurse. You might have a concussion.
I want to know if you know your name.
I'd still go to the nurse though.
I'm making spaghetti and meatballs tonight.
Since when don't you like spaghetti and meatballs, huh?
I'm all right. Just-- I fell, skating.
...think about leaving that filthy box in my kitchen.
Oh, well, then, by all means...
Why you kids ride those things, I'll never know.
translation.ko: 도대체 그런 건 왜 타는 거니?

translation.en: -Trust me, we were. -All right. Good to know.
-Where's the flood? -Follow me. I'll show you.
Too much water for the condenser tray or the heat exchange tubing.
This has got to be the fill line.
That's the only thing that makes any sense.
No, not tonight. I'll go by the hardware store tomorrow.
Good deal. And meanwhile, put this on your face.
Come on. I know a right cross when I see one.
Yes or no? Do I have to call somebody's father?
Well, I wouldn't tell your Aunt May.
I pity the poor kid who'd have to suffer her wrath.
Before you come up, see if...
They fix pipes and pump things.
I forgot all about that thing. It was your dad's.
translation.ko: 여태 잊고 살았네 네 아빠 가방인데

translation.en: -Yeah. -He asked us to keep it safe.
He saw it in the window of that leather shop over on 9th Avenue.
He was 19. What does a 19-year-old kid need with a briefcase?
And guess who sold it to him.
He asked you to keep this safe? There's nothing in here.
translation.ko: 왜 맡긴 거죠? 별거 들은 게

translation.en: Have you looked? There's nothing here.
Your father was a very secretive man, Peter.
Who's that? Do you know who that is?
Some guy who worked with your dad, I guess.
Just take this off the table, all right?
We're gonna eat. Off. And wash your hands.
I need you to be a good boy.
There's something your mom and I have to do.
Oh, my God. You look just like him.
translation.ko: - 네, 왜요? - 안경 쓰니까 아빠랑 똑같네

translation.en: Hell, I stopped being able to help with your homework when you were 10.
What I'm trying to say is...
...I know it's been rough for you without your dad.
And I know we don't talk much about them.
-Yeah, it's all right. -No, it is not all right.
I wish I could change it, but I can't.
That's the name of the guy in the picture with your dad.
They worked together for years and they were close.
But after that night, we never saw him again.
translation.ko: 그날 밤 이후로 한번도 못 봤다

translation.en: I don't know. I'm here to see Dr. Connors.
Right. You'll find yourself to the left.
You are here for the internship?
You'll find your badge to the left.
-Having trouble finding yourself? -No. Yeah, I got it.
Born from the mind of our founder, Norman Osborn...
...the Oscorp Tower houses 108 floors of innovation.
Our scientific minds are pushing the boundaries of defense, biomedical...
translation.ko: 저희는 군수, 생체의학 생화학 분야를 선도해 나갑니다

translation.en: ...and chemical technologies. The future lies within.
I'm Gwen Stacy, a senior at Midtown Science...
I'll be with you for the duration of your visit.

translation.en: Look, listen. Tell them Rodrigo Guevara is here.
Just tell them Rodrigo Guevara is here!
I guess I don't need to tell you what happens if you forget.
Welcome. My name is Dr. Curtis Connors.
Yes, in case you're wondering, I'm a southpaw.
I'm not a cripple, I'm a scientist...
...and the world's foremost authority on herpetology.
That's reptiles, for those of you who don't know.
Like the Parkinson's patient who watches on in horror...
translation.ko: 파킨슨 병에 걸려서 제대로 거동을 못하는 환자나
제대로 거동을 못하는 환자나 나날이 시력을 잃어가는 환자가 소원하듯이

translation.en: ...whose eyes grow dimmer each day, I long to fix myself.
I want to create a world without weakness.
translation.ko: 장애가 없는 세상을 만드는 게 내 꿈이죠

translation.en: Anyone care to venture a guess just how?
...when the brain cells that produce dopamine...
But a zebra fish has the ability...
If you could give this ability...
...to the woman you're talking about, that's that. She's....
Yeah, you just have to look past the gills on her neck.
I'm afraid duty calls. I'll leave you in the more-than-capable hands of Miss Stacy.

translation.en: If you'd like to gather round.
Welcome to Oscorp's tree of life.
Our planet's tree of life is immense.
I was gonna say I work here...
...but it seems like you do work here. So you know that I don't.
-You following me? -No, I'm not following you, no.
translation.ko: 날 따라온 거야? 그런 거 아냐 인턴인지도 몰랐어

translation.en: -I had no idea you worked here. -Why would you be here?

translation.en: -I have to lead this tour group. -I know.
I'll ask you more about this later. Do not get me in trouble.
translation.ko: 나중에 얘기해 딴 데로 새지 마

translation.en: -I promise you I won't. -Stay with the group.
All right, guys? I'm gonna take you to the bioreactor room now.
We received the results from the mRNA sequences this morning.
We are close, but it's gonna take time.
Norman Osborn is dying, Dr. Connors.
Or we'll both lose our heads.
All right, give me the badge.
Disgusting. Now I smell like beer.
I didn't mean to do that.
No, man, no. Not my board.
Next and final stop, Coney Island.
This beats all other meat loafs.
He took the frozen macaroni and cheese.
Why didn't you tell me you didn't like my meat loaf?
You could have said that to me 37 years ago.
How many meat loafs have I made for you?
-You don't remember me. I-- -The intern from the other day.
I'm sure you're very nice, but this is a home.
I ask you to make an appointment with my office.
I'm afraid I can't help you much.
I don't know why they left or where they were going.
Your father and I were mocked for our theories.
Not just in the community at large, but at Oscorp, as well.
And then your father bred the spiders...
We were gonna change the lives of millions.
translation.ko: 수백만 명의 삶을 바꿀 수도 있었어

translation.en: And I knew without him, I....
So I stayed away from you...
And for that, I'm truly sorry.
Say you got it to work.
Like, how much would the foreign species take over?
What could the side effects be?
It's hard to say, considering no subject survived.
How did you come up with this?
Peter, how about coming to see me at the Tower...
Number one, Reggie. Run it, buddy.
You did that on purpose, Flash!
I should've. You better watch your back.
-Come on, man. -Why don't you take it from me?
-Take it from him! -Come on, Flash. Take it.
All right, bring it! Come on, Parker! Come on!
-Peter's behavior is just unacceptable. -They won't make us pay...
translation.ko: 피터의 행동은 용납 안 됩니다 농구대는∙∙∙

translation.en: What I heard in there just now.

So all this is about getting even.
If so, I guess you must feel pretty good about yourself now, right?
Well, thanks to this little escapade of yours...
...I had to change shifts at work...
...so you have to pick up Aunt May tonight at 9 o'clock. Understood?
-Yeah. -He's got you on his computer. I'm his probation officer.

translation.en: He's a pathological liar. He thought you were someone else.
Oh, man, you don't have me on your computer?
I took a photo of the debate team, and you're in the debate team.

translation.en: ...he must have seen-- I was touching up stuff.

I didn't get expelled. I got community service.
So you want to-- I don't know...?
We could do something else, or we could--
-If you don't feel like, we could-- -Yeah.
Okay. All right, good. Sounds good.
-I can't right now, I can't right now. -Yeah, no.
-I'm so busy right now. -I know, me too.

translation.ko: - 나중에∙∙∙ - 그래 - 안녕 - 그래, 잘 가

translation.en: ...that's X-ray video. That's the only one on the planet. We have....

The idea was so simple. You load it with an antigen.
It creates a cloud which can be dispersed over a neighborhood, even a city.
Theoretically, you could cure polio in an afternoon.
Well, others disagreed. What if the device were loaded with a toxin?
translation.ko: 근데 악용의 우려가 높고 개인의 선택권을

translation.en: What if you wanted to opt out?
You can't run away from a cloud after all, so here it lies, gathering dust.
What you see here is a computer model of a lizard.
Many of these wonderful creatures have so brilliantly adapted...
...that they can regenerate entire limbs at will.
We're trying to harness this capability...
...and transfer it into our host subject:
See what I'm trying to do?
-Come on, come on, come on. -Pending. Failed.
Meet Fred and Wilma, our three-legged mice.
Okay. Careful, don't want to stick you by mistake.
Human trials aren't until next week.
Now, don't answer that, but I'm glad to know it's working.
You owe your aunt an apology bigtime.
Be a man. Get in there and apologize.
Honestly, you don't have to apologize to me. It's your--
translation.ko: 사과 안 해도 되는데 삼촌이 자꾸∙∙∙

translation.en: Look, I'm sorry, I got distracted.
Your aunt, my wife, had to walk 12 blocks alone...
...in the middle of the night and then wait in a deserted subway station...

translation.ko: 너 때문에! 여보, 그거 좀 걸은 게

translation.en: ...I am completely capable of walking home--
You will not defend this boy!
You're a lot like your father.
You really are, Peter, and that's a good thing...
...but your father lived by a philosophy, a principle, really.
He believed that if you could do good things for other people...
...you had a moral obligation to do those things.
That's all well and good. So where is he?
He didn't think it was his responsibility to be here to tell me himself?
translation.ko: 그 철학, 직접 말해주는 게 아빠 책임 아닌가요?

translation.en: Oh, come on, how dare you?
How dare I? How dare you?
Ben, leave him alone for a little while. He'll be all right.
Yeah, you're holding up the line. No.
You can leave a penny, you can't take a penny.
...a penny anytime, you have to spend 10 dollars...
translation.ko: 이 동전 쓰려면 10불 이상 사야 돼

translation.en: ...to take a penny. It's store policy.
-You're holding up my line. -I don't have 2 cents.
You can't afford milk, step aside.
Daddy didn't give you enough milk money today?
Someone call an ambulance! Uncle Ben, Uncle Ben.
Witnesses gave a description to the sketch artist. I need you to take a look.
I didn't expect you would, ma'am. Homicide detectives are on it.
We'll see what they turn up.
There's one other thing. He has a star...
Peter, I know things have been difficult lately...
I think I know what you're feeling.
-Not today. -Come on, I just want to talk.
translation.ko: - 오늘은 건들지 마 - 얘기 좀 하자

translation.en: You like beating on old men?
-You're in the wrong place. -When were you in Queens?
Get back here, man! Get him!
He has a star tattooed on his left hand.
I know what you look like!
We're just beginning to understand all the potential industrial applications.
translation.ko: 오스코프 사가 개발한 바이오 케이블은 수많은 산업 분야에서 다양한 용도로 쓰이며

translation.en: A single pellet can safely store several hundred meters...
Attention, all units in the confines of Precinct 13, receiving a 10-30...
Last seen on foot heading eastbound on 19th Street.
Well, no, he wears a mask.
...are suspects with serious rap sheets. They're calling him a vigilante.
Okay, he's not a vigilante, he's an anarchist.
Extraordinary velocity vector is a function...
Come on, you know better than anyone...
...the weight on any pendulum has no effect on speed.
It doesn't affect frequency, but it's totally a factor in momentum.
In the future, if you're gonna steal cars...
...don't dress like a car thief, man.
What are you? You a cop?
Really? You seriously think I'm a cop? Cop in a skin-tight red-and-blue suit?

There you go. You got it.

translation.en: -My weakness, it's small knives. -Just let me go.

translation.en: Anything but knives! Oh, it's so simple.
translation.ko: - 날 보내줘 - 칼만은 안 돼! 참 단순해요

translation.en: -I don't think you want to know. -Let me go!

translation.en: Okay, one second. Hold on, one second.
Come on, let me go. Stop it!
This could've gone a lot worse.
No one grasps the concept of the mask.
translation.ko: 말해줄 거 같음 마스크 안 썼죠

translation.en: I just did 80 percent of your job.
And that? That's how you repay me?
You don't have to wait up for me.
No, you most certainly will not.
Take off the damn hood and look at me.
Please go to sleep, Aunt May.
I can't sleep. Don't you understand? I can't sleep.
translation.ko: 잘 수가 없어 걱정돼서 못 잔다구!

translation.en: I've used the lizard DNA to help Freddy regrow that limb.
No, it's hard work and promise.
-It's a step closer to the primate lab. -He doesn't have time for every little step.
translation.ko: - 곧 영장류에 실험할 거요 - 사치 부릴 시간 없어요

translation.en: Unless he wants to be a lab rat.
You have to start human trials.
-Now. -No, I don't, and no, I won't.
-Well, then he's going to die. -People die.
Where are you going to find the people to volunteer?
As far as anyone's concerned, it's for a flu shot.
I might think the Veterans Hospital is a place to start.
It's a little late for shock and indignation.
I have no idea what you're talking about.
On you, it's a cheap suit, as it was then.
I had nothing to do with that.
Is that what you told his son?
I don't know what you're saying.
You don't know, or you don't wanna know?
Richard Parker said just about the same thing then that you are saying now.

translation.en: The clock is ticking, Dr. Connors.
The formula is ours now anyway.
Say goodbye to that arm you have dreamed of.
Have your office cleared out by the morning.
Your toys can be taken away too, you know.
Maybe I got a rash or....
It's bad. Have you gone to the nurse?
No, no. I know. I know.
...you can come to this address at 8:00 tonight.
It's apartment 2016. I didn't write that part down.
How did you get out there?
-This is your room. -Yes, this is my room.
No, it's impressive. They actually held together very well.
You have your suit in there?
It's for dinner. Are you gonna--?
-You must be Peter. -Dad, this is Peter.
The car is taking him to the Veterans Hospital in Brooklyn.
You have to stop him. He--
I would, but I always lose him on the bridge.
I'll make sure Dr. Ratha returns your call as soon as possible.
I'm going to Holton Avenue, across the river. I'm in a hurry.

translation.en: You want me to take the tunnel or the bridge?
Hey, you all right back there?
The head goes on the other--
Help Gwen's friend with his fish.
-Tell us about your day. -Did you catch that spider guy yet?

But we will. He's an amateur...
...who's assaulting civilians in the dead of night.
I mean, I saw that video...

I think most people would say that he was...

It's called strategy. I'm sure you're aware of the term?
You've heard about that in school?
-He didn't know you had a plan. -You seem to know...

translation.en: ...a lot about this. Know something we don't?
-Whose side are you on? -I'm not on anyone's side.

-Well, then the case is closed. -Well, no.
If you watch the video-- Maybe send you a link?
It looks like he's trying to help.
On the Internet he's being made out to look like a hero.
No, no. I'm not saying he's a hero.
-What are you trying to say? -He's trying to help.
He's trying to do something the police can't.
-I don't know. -What do you think we do?
-...with our thumbs planted up our asses? -George.
He stands for what you stand for.
Protecting innocent people from bad guys.
I stand for law and order. That's what I stand for.
This guy wears a mask like an outlaw.
He's hunting down criminals that all look the same...
...like he's got some sort of personal vendetta.
But he's not protecting innocent people, Mr. Parker.
-Dad, we need to talk. -Yes, we do.

translation.en: I'm sorry if I insulted you. It was not my intention.

No, I wouldn't have let him arrest you.
-What happened to your face? -I wanna tell you something.

I gotta tell you this one thing about the vigilante and the car thief.
-No, no, no. -I don't want to talk about that.
Forget that. I won't talk about that.
-I'm gonna talk about me, okay? -What about you?
It's impo-- I wish I could just--
I can't. It's hard to say.
Your father wants you to come inside.
Will you please find out what is going on, Alfred?
Somebody help! Help me! My kid is trapped!
Just a normal guy, all right?
Okay, look. I'll undo the belt.
You hold on to that seat in front of you. On three?

There you go. That's it. That's it, buddy.
Do me a favor. A little faster, okay, bud?
You're doing great, buddy. You're doing great.
...9 p.m. last night, an incident took place on the Williamsburg Bridge.
Much of what occurred is speculation at this point.

...as well as our own preliminary findings...

translation.en: ...for the masked vigilante known as Spider-Man.

So I gotta go after it.

I gave everyone the week off.
No, I got a free track.

There is something more dangerous, and I know who.
...who's my daughter's mentor. Is that who?

It was beautiful. When I read it, I cried.
...that he is running around dressed up like a dinosaur?

translation.en: Not dressing up and not a dinosaur. He has transformed himself into a lizard.
Let me ask you a question.

I'm telling you the absolute truth.
This man has worked for his whole life on cross-species genetics.
He lost an arm, he tried to grow it back, but the equation was imbalanced.

I'm gonna go back to protecting the citizens of this fine, fair city of ours.

Blood panels reveal lymphocyte and monocyte readings...
Subject no longer requires corrective lenses.
This is no longer about curing ills.
In attempt to redress regenerative relapse...
Also, my father is under the impression...
You should see the other guy.
The other guy, in this instance, being a giant mutant lizard.
Do you want cocoa? Howard's making some.
No, Dad, I do not want cocoa.
I remembered somebody saying her fantasy was to live in a chocolate house.
translation.ko: 초콜릿 집에 살고 싶다고 말한 게 누구더라?

translation.en: I can't have cocoa right now because I'm work--
I feel kind of pukey and just sort of....
-Like, emotional. I keep crying. -It's okay. Good.
I'm going to be all right.
Every day, for as long as I can remember...

translation.ko: 난 아주 어렸을 때부터 아빠가 아침마다

translation.en: ...and he's put a badge on his chest...
...and strapped a gun to his hip.
And every day, for as long as I can remember...
...I haven't known if he was gonna make it home.
I have to, because I created him.
Something my father had been working on, you know.
translation.ko: 우리 아빠가 오랫동안 비밀리에 연구하신 거

translation.en: Secretly. Now I realize why he kept it a secret.
Point is, this is my responsibility.
Let's just get out of here.
Just for a minute. Can we?
If my parents see me leaving, I'm dead.
Your parents aren't gonna see you leaving.
I'm not the one who needs help.
There will be no more loneliness...
...could enhance humanity on an evolutionary scale.
One has to adapt to survive.
"That, changing like the snake, I might be free...
...to cast off flesh wherein I dwell confined."
Would you give it all up...
...after all you know you can do?
You're not gonna get in the way of my plan, Peter Parker!
translation.ko: 내 계획을 막지 마라 피터 파커!

translation.en: I can save them. I can cure them.
There's no need to stop me, Peter.
-I'm gonna throw you out the window. -What?
...from the New York City Police Department.
translation.ko: 뉴욕 경찰국 윌리엄스 경위다 건물은 완전히 포위됐다

translation.en: I'm fine. I'm okay. I'm in the sewer, tracking him.
I gotta stop him before anyone gets hurt.
-Do you know how to run a serum? -I do it all the time.
translation.ko: - 혈청 만들 줄 알아? - 인턴 하면서 배웠어

translation.en: Okay, great. Okay, I need you to go to Oscorp.
I need you to access the cross-species file. It's a blue serum.
I spent my life as a scientist trying to create a world without weakness...
I sought to create a stronger human being...
Human beings are weak, pathetic, feeble-minded creatures.
...when we can be so much more?
This is my gift to you.
We have a confirmed sighting, sir. The Lizard's headed toward Canal Street.
translation.ko: 리자드맨이 커넬 스트리트 - 역으로 갔습니다 - 스파이더맨은?

translation.en: I want that Spider-Man off the street.
The lizard creature has released a biological agent.
All efforts to stop him have failed...
...and he is now proceeding north on 7th Avenue. Over.
You have to get out of there now.
Connors is on the way. He's coming to you right now.
He needs the device. He's gonna infect the whole city!
translation.ko: 가날리 장비로 도시 전체를 감염시키려고 해

translation.en: You're gonna wait eight minutes after what I told you?
Gwen! Gwen! You Mother Hubbard. Are you serious?
Stand down now, or we will open fire.
You are surrounded. There is no escape.
translation.ko: 넌 완전히 포위됐다 도망 못 가

translation.en: And your daughter's there right now.
Well, Paul, if I didn't see it, I wouldn't believe it.
I won't venture to say what it is crawling up...
...the north side of the Oscorp Tower...
...but clearly it is not human and it is very, very strong.
We're getting the latest details. This is just coming in.
If you are south of 54th Street...
...you have to move out of the area immediately.
Spider-Man appears to be heading towards Oscorp.
...and it's really not clear if he's gonna make it.
Something bad's going down in Midtown.
Still friends with Matthews, that crane operator on 6th?
-Yeah. -Get him on the phone for me.
Get him on the phone for me.
Hey, Charlie, get me Enriquez on 54th Street!
-You got it. -Angelo, get your mug over here.
...swing your jib arms over the avenue. Boom angles at 90 degrees.
translation.ko: 모든 타워크레인들은 도로 위로 방향 틀어서

translation.en: Spider-Man needs those big boys high and lined up.
Let's give him a clear approach. Over.
-I have to get this to Spider-Man. -Get in.
-It can stop the Lizard. -Get in the car.
Your boyfriend is a man of many masks.
-Okay. -Let's get you out of here. Come on.
Look at me. Stay with me.
-Help's on the way, okay? -You need to....
You need to be gone when they get here.
I was wrong about you, Peter.
Sometimes the people closest to you.
So I want you to promise me something, okay?
An eerie calm has set in over New York City.
Apparently, some sort of aerosolized antidote...
...which seems to have counteracted the biotoxins.
Residents of Lower Manhattan can rest peacefully...
...knowing that the alleged mastermind of this terror plot...
translation.ko: 계획하고 감행한 커트 코너스 박사는 수감됐습니다

translation.en: ...on the street for a report in Lower Manhattan.
Two of my teachers showed up.
Can't do this. Can't do this.
He made you promise, didn't he?
To stay away from me, so I'd be safe.
I'm just no good for her.
Peter Parker, if there's one thing you are, it's good.
Anyone has a problem with that can talk to me.
Peter, I know things have been difficult lately...
I think I know what you're feeling.
Ever since you were a little boy...
...you've been living with so many unresolved things.
Well, take it from an old man:
Those things send us down a road.
They make us who we are.
And if anyone's destined for greatness, it's you, son.
translation.ko: 위대해질 운명을 갖고 태어난 아이 바로 너란다

translation.en: You owe the world your gifts.
translation.ko: 네가 가진 능력을 세상을 위해 쓰렴

translation.en: You just have to figure out how to use them.
And know that wherever they take you...
Come on, guys, you heard the bell. Get to class.
I had a professor once who liked to tell his students...
...that there were only 10 different plots in all of fiction.
Well, I'm here to tell you he was wrong.
At least we can always count on you.
Sorry, Miss Ritter, won't happen again, I promise.
Don't make promises you can't keep.
Yeah, but those are the best kind.
Did you tell the boy the truth about his father?
So we'll let him be for now.
